alert.note: Alert for Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 6:59AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF HARRISON, SOUTHEASTERN HANCOCK AND NORTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM CST... At 659 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of McHenry to 6 miles east of Pearlington. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, St. Martin, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Gulf Hills, Hurley, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates, Saucier, and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 13 and 58. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
